definitions.title: vb. be hungry, hunger,
definitions.body: perh also hungrily desire (Aram loan-word; cf. Aram. [[כְּפֵין]], [[כְּפַן]], kfen be hungry; Ar. kafana is spin wool, wrap a corpse in the shroud);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[כָּֽפְנׇה עַל]] Ez Eze 17:7 (si vera l.) this vine stretched its roots hungrily towards ( ‖[[שִׁלְּחָה לְ ]] ).
